attributes.action: remain life long president of the UK with no elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair has repeatedly proved his total integrity and trustworthiness. He has ceaselessly promoted World Peace and International Law. He has avoided the trap of announcing things for effect and failng to follow up. Therefore he is the greatest leader ever and should not have to suffer the need of those annoying elections. And he defintely didnt sex any documents up.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
